name: Das Reich der Toten
overview: The Realm of the Dead in English, this is an unreleased, but fully playable 2D RPG adventure game from Michael Härtig that was created in 1994. Your player character gets four different properties. These are strength and dexterity with weapons, endurance when moving and humor for dealing with the king's daughter. You can have a maximum of 15 points for each of these characteristics. Initially you have 7 points and develop from there.
